ValidationRule.description: Rule prevents unauthorized users from creating accounts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), $User.Account_Creation_Allowed__c <> TRUE, $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Direct Sales Support', $Profile.Name <> 'Direct Sales Support Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Frontier System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Multifamily Sales', $Profile.Name <> '#Alternate Channel - Sales Support', $Profile.Name <> 'Multifamily Leadership', $Profile.Name <> 'Frontier Auditor', $Profile.Name <> 'Offline Promo', $Profile.Name <> '#CTF Small Business User', $Profile.Name <> '#Alternate Channel Manager', $Profile.Name <> '#Alternate Channel Leadership', $Profile.Name <> '#Commercial SMB Sales', $Profile.Name <> 'Lead Development Rep (LDR)', $Profile.Name <> '#MTU', RecordType.Name!='Service', RecordType.Name!='Billing', RecordType.Name!='Grant Company', NOT( AND( ftr_Approved_Creation_Process__c = true, $Profile.Name = 'Frontier Partner Portal User', RecordType.Name = 'Master', Parent.Name = 'Global Portal Account' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This profile is restricted from creating new accounts. Please enter an Account Management case and provide the following information: Account Name, BTN, Billing and Service Addresses.
